original_text:
The haughty looks of man shall be brought low,
    and the lofty pride of men shall be humbled,
and the Lord alone will be exalted in that day.
korean_text: 그 날에 눈이 높은 자가 낮아지며 교만한 자가 굴복되고 여호와께서 홀로 높임을 받으시리라

sentences.original_text: The haughty looks of man shall be brought low
and the lofty pride of men shall be humbled
and the Lord alone will be exalted in that day
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 주님만이 그 날에 높임을 받으시리라
